alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 6:04AM MDT until April 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT /11 AM PDT/ TODAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Periods of slush and snow covered roads making for variable road conditions. * WHERE...Dixie, Highway 93 Sula to Lost Trail Pass, Lolo Pass, and Williams Creek Summit. * WHEN...From midnight MDT /11 PM PDT/ tonight to noon MDT /11 AM PDT/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
